name: attribute-invalid-value-class
description: A schema value class issue, saying there is an unknown one.
common_causes: Referencing non-existent value classes in valueClass attributes
Using deprecated or removed value classes
Missing value class definitions in schema
explanation: ValueClass attributes must reference valid value classes defined in the schema. Invalid value class references cause validation failures and prevent proper value validation.
correction_strategy: Use valid value class names that exist in the schema

correction_examples.explanation: Replaced unknown value class with valid one

correction_patterns: Verify value class exists in schema
Check value class name spelling and case
Use defined value class names only
Remove references to non-existent value classes
fix_instructions: 1. Check available value classes in schema
validation_hints: Cross-reference with schema value class definitions
Check value class name case sensitivity
Verify value class exists before referencing
